Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western The Boltons, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Stamford Bridge Stadium and Imperial College London. This 4-star bed & breakfast is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 57 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the bed & breakfast's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and an elevator (lift).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the bed & breakfast's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Best Western The Boltons, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Stamford Bridge Stadium and Imperial College London. This 4-star bed & breakfast is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Stamford Bridge Stadium - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
London Natural History Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Imperial College London - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
London Science Museum - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Holland Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Brompton Oratory - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Broadway Shopping Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Kensington Gardens - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Beauchamp Place - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western The Boltons is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
